name: api_design_nodejs_frontendmasters
description: 1. First step when cloning or collaborating with other developers, run npm install - this will install all dependencies listed in package.json. 2. To start the development server, run the following command:    ```    npm start    ```    This will start the server and you can view the application in your web browser at http://localhost:3000.
